    now = datetime.datetime.now().strftime("%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")
    txt = f"{title}\nExported on: {now}\n\n"
    for msg in messages:
        txt += f"{msg['role'].capitalize()}:\n{msg['content']}\n\n{'-'*80}\n\n"
    return txt
